\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 44914}

\subsection*{Buzz}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Darcy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5.0 g & smoked & Passion Flower & plant material\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 110.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have a passion flower plant in my garden, so i picked some and rolled it in a joint and smoked it. I gave me a buzz and the smoke really hurt my throat. I am going to try a morning glory/passionflower blend soon to see if it ampliflies the effects.I recommend it. It's a great alternative to tobacco.

\end{document}
